name: Alagsor
description:
Alagsor is a 2D puzzle game with pixal art retro graphics, inspired by Snake, Sokoban and Namco's Battle City.

You control a snake-like, one eyed creature, which can transform its body to solid wall and your goal is to pass every level - obviously - without dying. Meanwhile you have to collect keys, move boxes, avoid enemies, etc. - and of course the difficulty raises continuously

Máté Pribelszky · Alagsor - Main Theme
